trans-unit.id:
settings_sailfishos-la-fs_optimizing_for_os_updateA new OS update is around the corner.

To be able to download the OS update, we need to maintenance the filesystem. This requires approx. 1.5 GB of free space.

You will be able to use your device, but you might notice some slowdowns. It may take up to an hour to complete.
trans-unit.source:
A new OS update is around the corner.

To be able to download the OS update, we need to maintenance the filesystem. This requires approx. 1.5 GB of free space.

You will be able to use your device, but you might notice some slowdowns. It may take up to an hour to complete.

seg-source.mrk:
A new OS update is around the corner.

To be able to download the OS update, we need to maintenance the filesystem.

This requires approx. 1.5 GB of free space.

You will be able to use your device, but you might notice some slowdowns.
It may take up to an hour to complete.

target.mrk:
Täze OU täzeleme basym gelýär.

Täzeleme göçürip alandan öň, biz faýl ulgamynda tehniki hyzmat barlagy ýerine ýetireris.

Ol takmynan 1,5 GB boş ýeri talap edýär.

Siz öz enjamyňyzy ulanyp bilersiňiz, emma siz käbir ýuwaşatmalary synlap bilersiňiz.

trans-unit.id: settings_sailfishos-la-backup_failed_detailed_descriptionChoose 'Continue without backup' to update the OS without backing up your data, or 'Cancel' to cancel the OS update. We recommend backing up your data before updating the OS.
trans-unit.source: Choose 'Continue without backup' to update the OS without backing up your data, or 'Cancel' to cancel the OS update. We recommend backing up your data before updating the OS.

seg-source.mrk: Choose 'Continue without backup' to update the OS without backing up your data, or 'Cancel' to cancel the OS update.
We recommend backing up your data before updating the OS.

Time elapsed since last update check. Takes a timestamp as a parameter (in format 'N minutes/hours/days ago'). Notice that the timestamp localization expects that it's in the beginning of a sentence, thus a colon is needed after "Last checked".

trans-unit.id: settings_sailfishos-la-install_disclaimerThis operation takes some time, in which you're not able to use the device, make or receive any calls or make emergency calls. Device will reboot after installation.
